title: AI-Driven Personalized E-Learning Environment Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental educational theory and experience in utilizing online teaching tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capabilities of pre-service/in-service teachers to design customized e-learning environments for social studies subjects.

learning_goals: Design AI-based personalized content recommendation systems through learner profile analysis
Can propose three or more strategies for optimizing personalized learning pathways based on cognitive theories of education
Can establish a plan to measure learning effectiveness using formative assessment tools implementable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
